definition: to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: You have to change at Chicago station.
sentences.chinese: 你必須要在芝加哥站轉車。

sentences.english: At Jamaica, Harriet transferred from the train to a bus.
sentences.chinese: 在牙買加，哈麗特從火車轉車到公交車上。

sentences.english: Your attention please, passenger to Hang Hau and Po Lam, please change train at this station.
sentences.chinese: 請注意，前往坑口及寶林的乘客，請系本站轉車。

sentences.english: The Wudaokou station is on the lightrail, so you’ll have to transfer.
sentences.chinese: 五道口地鐵是輕軌站，所以你要轉車。

sentences.english: You have to transfer your train at Paris.
Thanks a lot. Could you give me a transfer?
sentences.chinese: 非常感謝，請給我一張轉車的車票。

sentences.english: How much time is left for passengers to transfer to the airport?
sentences.chinese: 剩下多少時間可以讓旅客轉車到機場？

sentences.english: 15 you have to change at Chicago station。
sentences.chinese: 你必須要在芝加哥站轉車。

sentences.english: He went across Fourteenth Street on the car and got a transfer south on Broadway.
sentences.chinese: 他乘有軌電車穿過十四街，在百老匯大街轉車朝南。

sentences.english: You change at Lewes and East Croydon.
sentences.chinese: 到路易斯和東克羅伊登轉車。

sentences.english: Please exit for the Island Line towards Chai Wan.
sentences.chinese: 前往港島線柴灣方向沿途各站，請在該站轉車。

sentences.english: You have to transfer at Guangzhou station.
sentences.chinese: 你必須在廣州車站轉車。

sentences.english: This address on Forty-second Street, please.

definition: to take the car, bus, train etc
to transfer/to change trains, buses etc
to take a taxi (in town)/to hitch a lift
travel time/expected time for a car journey
to ride (in a car or carriage)/to drive/to motor
to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
to cross a barrier/to get through (an ordeal)/to pass (a test)/to reach (a standard)
